formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: The formula to calculate optimal cycle time and green time is: Cycle Time: \( C = \frac{1.5L + 5}{1 - \frac{\sum Y}{S}} \) Green Time: \( G = C \times \frac{Y}{\sum Y} \)

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
